content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and I received a command to browse the website https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence and gather information on the different types of artificial intelligence. The command returned an answer from the website, which provided an overview of AI including its definition, history, sub-fields, approaches, techniques, and tools used, as well as its applications, philosophical debates, limitations, risks, and development. While some sources provide a comprehensive list of different types of AI, others touch on the topic but do not provide a specific categorization.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_tests", "args": {"code": "def add_numbers(a, b):\\n    return a + b\\n\\nprint(add_numbers(2, 3))\\nprint(add_numbers(5, 7))", "focus": ["Addition functionality"]}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_tests returned: return """\n# Test case for add_numbers function\ndef test_add_numbers():\n    assert add_numbers(2, 3) == 5, "Test Case 1 Failed"\n    assert add_numbers(5, 7) == 12, "Test Case 2 Failed"\n"""\n\n# I have added a test case for the existing code with a focus on the addition functionality.', type='action_result')]
"""
